roleset.name: infection with a parasite whose entire lifecycle is lived in a single host
roleset.note: AUTOINFECT-V, AUTOINFECTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.

example.name: autoinfect-v
example.text: Strongyloides is unique in that an alternative soil-independent cycle can occur in which-1 [affected individuals]-2 are repetitively autoinfected *-2 with infectious larvae *-1.

example.name: autinfection-n
example.text: Rarely autoinfection with the increasing worm burden can lead to dissemination and hyperinfection of the individual.
